# Support

## Need Help?

If you have questions or run into issues, please check:
*   [Issues](https://github.com/nexogic-org/korelin/issues) for bug reports and feature requests.

## Sponsor

If you like Korelin, please support us on Afdian:
[https://afdian.com/a/nexogic](https://afdian.com/a/nexogic)
